board_desc: "An ultra-premium, hyper-polished black & white DC Universe battleboard. The squares are crafted from alternating slabs of Kryptonian crystal marble (white) and obsidian Gotham basalt (black). cosmic star-map Some black squares shimmer like portals into the Phantom Zone. Some white squares refract light like Fortress of Solitude ice architecture. Entire board is 8×8, seamless orthographic top-down view, 8k resolution, photorealistic, with a faint aura of cosmic energy pulsing along the grid lines."
piece_desc: "DC Cinematic Universe meets high-end collector statue — hyper-detailed, cinematic lighting, realistic materials, heroic poses. RENDER STYLE: Premium studio collectible photography, ultra-sharp, micro-detail, dramatic rim-lighting.WHITE (Justice League) King – Superman A towering, noble Man of Steel, cape flowing, eyes faintly glowing red with suppressed heat vision. Suit texture ultra-detailed Kryptonian weave. Queen – Wonder Woman Amazon warrior queen with shining armor, lasso glowing, shield and sword ready. Her stance radiates power and grace. Bishop – Green Lantern (Hal Jordan) Construct energy platform base, emerald textures, ring blazing. His body posture suggests constant flight. Knight – Batman Crouched predator stance atop a mini-Gargoyle, cape swept like wings. Matte tactical armor with metallic highlights, glowing white eyes. Rook – Aquaman Trident raised, water swirling around the base. Atlantean armor, wet sheen, glowing runes.Pawn – The Flash (Barry Allen) Speed force crackling around the ankles. Vibrant suit with glowing seams. Pose suggests imminent sprint.BLACK (Legion of Doom) King – Lex Luthor (Kryptonite Battle Suit) Bald, imposing, glowing green armor pulsing with Kryptonite energy, intimidating silhouette, glossy metal with green veins. Queen – Cheetah Ferocious, sinewy, golden-fur sheen. Dynamic motion-ready pose. Razor claws extended. Bishop – Sinestro Yellow Lantern armor glowing, sinister smirk, magenta skin saturated and high contrast. Yellow constructs swirl at feet. Knight – The Joker Leaning forward with manic energy. Purple suit stylized like a deadly jester-knight. Playing-card razorblade in hand. Rook – Black Manta Armored, sleek, red glowing eyes, water jet base. Back thrusters and wrist-mounted plasma cannons. Pawn – Reverse Flash (Eobard Thawne) Yellow-and-red crackling lightning, corrupted speedforce aura, aggressive sprint pose."
anim_desc: "DC Blockbuster Combat — explosive, cinematic, superhero-scale clashes with triple-camera cuts, slow motion, lens flares, destructible environments, lightning, explosions, and energy blasts. GENERAL KILLS (Standard Attacks): Justice League (White): Superman uses heat vision, frost breath, or shockwave punches. Wonder Woman slices or shields-bashes with explosive force. Green Lantern constructs giant hammers, cages, or energy blasts. Batman uses gadgets, shadows, EMPs, and grapnel-based takedowns. Aquaman conjures water spears or trident shockwaves. The Flash uses supersonic punches, phasing attacks, or tornado spins. Legion of Doom (Black): Lex’s suit fires Kryptonite beams and energy missiles. Cheetah strikes with animalistic speed and claws. Sinestro uses fear-based constructs (chains, blades, beasts). Joker uses laughing-gas explosions, joker-bombs, or razor cards. Black Manta fires twin-eye lasers or shockwave charges. Reverse Flash performs speedforce stabs, vibrating strikes, or lightning slashes. ROYALTY LOGIC — MUST BE EPIC AND CINEMATIC If King or Queen is ATTACKING: Superman (White King): Unleashes full heat-vision beam, ground shockwave, or flies the enemy into the sky and smashes them down like a meteor. Wonder Woman (White Queen): Uses lasso to slam, sword to slice energy arcs, or shield to create a blinding shockwave.Lex Luthor (Black King): Fires a world-ending Kryptonite mega-beam, deploys orbital drones, or punches with hydraulics strong enough to crater the board. Cheetah (Black Queen): Blinding-speed claw storms, feral leaps, bone-crushing impacts, and sonic shrieks. 2. If King or Queen is DYING (Slow Motion Heroic/Villainous End): Superman: Falls backward in slow motion, cape fluttering, eyes dimming, cracking marble beneath him. Wonder Woman: Drops shield, sparks fly from armor, collapses gracefully as her lasso fades out. Lex Luthor: Suit malfunctions, exploding with green Kryptonite sparks, helmet cracks, systems fail one by one. Cheetah: Lets out a feral scream as she disintegrates into golden dust or collapses into rubble of broken stone. 5. FINAL ANIMATION RULE (Your Direction): EPIC SUPERHERO BLOCKBUSTER STYLE BATTLES WHERE BOTH RIGHT AND LEFT SIDES ATTACK — BUT ONLY THE LEFT SIDE REMAINS Meaning:Every kill animation is a two-sided clash.Both characters use signature attacks simultaneously. The left-side attacker ultimately wins and stands victorious, breathing heavily, sparks flying, lightning fading.You have 8 seconds use the camera change angles to make it cinematic and comic book like.NEVER replace the characters with generic ones. ALWAYS use the chess piece characters."
